enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve setting error-related fields and are often used together to fully define an error code.
Setting the error number often precedes setting the reason phrase, which provides additional context for the error.
The getErrorCode method relies on the error number being set correctly, making it a critical method to invoke after setting the error number.
The encode method requires the error number to be set correctly before it can generate the correct binary representation of the error code.
